derivation.yuyuan_name: from Portuguese peão and Spanish peón, from medieval Latin pedo, pedon- 'walker, foot soldier', from Latin pes, ped- 'foot'. Compare with pawn

means.word_mean: 1. a laborer who is obliged to do menial work
